scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:emoji-metadata && npm run build:search-index && npm run build:sitemap && vite build
scripts.build:emoji-metadata: npm run clone:cldr && npm run clone:fluentui && npm run clone:noto && tsx scripts/emoji-metadata-builder.ts ./src/Artifacts/ scripts/assets/cldr/
scripts.clone:cldr: git clone --single-branch --branch=release-45 --no-checkout --filter=tree:0 --sparse --depth=1 https://github.com/unicode-org/cldr scripts/assets/cldr && git -C ./scripts/assets/cldr/ sparse-checkout set common/annotations common/annotationsDerived && git -C ./scripts/assets/cldr/ checkout
scripts.clone:fluentui: git clone --no-checkout --filter=tree:0 --sparse --depth=1 https://github.com/microsoft/fluentui-emoji scripts/assets/fluentui-emoji && git -C ./scripts/assets/fluentui-emoji/ sparse-checkout set assets && git -C ./scripts/assets/fluentui-emoji/ checkout 464fae50f14b55ffa61af4c8c23b571afaea2533
scripts.clone:noto: git clone --no-checkout --filter=tree:0 --sparse --depth=1 https://github.com/googlefonts/noto-emoji scripts/assets/noto-emoji && git -C ./scripts/assets/noto-emoji/ sparse-checkout set svg && git -C ./scripts/assets/noto-emoji/ checkout 254596e5f8a7991229f4b8292eb3b7fa41662446
